name: Switchy Floaties // Nintendo Switch on acid
description: Tribute to a fabulous Nintendo console, the Switch. A little trip into colors and sounds, inspired by Nintendo Switch's controller shape, while experimenting with impossible and surreal materials. Created with Cinema 4D + Otoy Octane render engine. Post FX and audio done in Adobe After Effects. // 20 secs, 30 FPS, 666 x 666 pix resolution, H264 codec, mp4, 28.2mb file
